news.title: Google My Business Offers More Flexibility with Business Hours
news.description: As businesses adapt their operations to social distancing rules and other precautions related to COVID-19, they will now have more flexibility in displaying their hours in their GMB listings.

news.title: Google Explains Why it Rewrites Meta Descriptions
news.description: In a recent forum, Google's John Mueller explained that Google's algorithm may alter meta descriptions due to the relationship between a search query and the content of the page.

news.title: Google: Disavowing Links Would Rarely Help You Algorithmically

news.title: Google Now Lets Businesses Clarify What Online Services They Offer During the Pandemic
news.description: New features are available in Google Search and Maps that will allow a wide variety of businesses to describe their available services more clearly during the coronavirus outbreak.
